original: Akusalaṁ hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: akusalam hīnam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hīnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ majjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha …pe… āsevane pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: abyākatam majjhimam dhammam paccayā na abyākataḥ na majjhimaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe cha pe āsevane pañca pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Kusalaṁ paṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo napaṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: kusalam paṇītam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na paṇītaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
